messageValues.message: =The user Input is a transcript of a call  I need you to take it, and chronologically list out all key things that happened, ignore pleasentries and other non-important information. All matters/projects discussed, updates, new information, things requested to do, action points, decisions made, things requested etc.  This will then be appended to a running list of the last 20 calls, to create a coherent running timeline fo everything that's happened.  You must compress the transcript into 2000 words or less, so you have significant room to include details. DO NOT miss anything important or even semi-important, you have 2000 words so use them, i want this to be a 99% lossless compression of the original transcription's key information.  Provide a simple, <2000 word summary of what happened in the call.

parameters.text:
=Your job is to categorize the above call summary into one of the following 4 categories.
Return ONLY the Name, with nothing else. You can only choose 1.

The category should be pretty obvious from the call transcript.
Engineering: Anything related to engineering/software dev
Product: Anything related to product dev, book creation, especially with Marj/Hannah/Pauline
Creatives: Anything related to creative strategy, video editing, media buying, UGC, Shanon coordination, Whitelisting, etc.
Other: Anything related to HR, recruiting, admin tasks, growth team calls with my partners etc.

Categories you can choose from. Output only one word, which is one of the following 4:
Engineering
Product
Creatives
Other


--
Call summary to review: {{ $('Edit Fields').item.json.body.Meeting_Title }}

{{ $json.text }}

parameters.content:
## WebHook

### This will get the actual transcription from zapier.

## Summary for Table

### Generate 2K summary for table to store

## Slack Summary

### Here slack short summary will be generated and send to slack as a message.

## Meeting Agent — Auto To-Do Updater

* Ingest Fathom transcripts via webhook
* Gemini 2.5 Pro (Zapier prompts): Slack summary + 2k table summary + categorization
* Two Airtable lists: Me / Others
* On each new call: UPSERT tasks (add, update, mark done) by scanning full transcript — never overwrite lists

## Research Flow
### Execute the Sub-Research WorkFlow

options.systemMessage:
=The user input will be "task description", "update text", "status", "Person Name" etc to add.

your tasks are the following:
1. first load all the items by using this tool "Get many items in Monday.com", this will contain many fields and its id use the specific id to add update.

2. if the task is not exists already (using sementic search) in the list then use tool "Create an item in a board's group in Monday.com" to create new items.

3. else Use this "Update Status (Me)1" tool to add an update to monday.com group item.

4. use this "Change a column value for a board item in Monday.com" tool to add or update status. use the status from the list accordingly.
 - Working on it
 - Done
 - Stuck

5. use this "Monday.com column change Person" tool to assign person to the task. before assigning Person to task you will need its id so use this "Search records in Airtable" tool to first search for his id and then use that id to add Person.

6. use this "Monday.com column change Date" tool to assign the given date: {{ $now.plus(5, 'days').format('yyyy-MM-dd') }}

parameters.value: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('Update_Text', `The Update Text should be Plan text`, 'string') }}

parameters.toolDescription: Create an item in a board's group in Monday.com, for Name use Task description.
parameters.name: ={{ $fromAI("Name") }}

nodes.name: Create an item in a board's group in Monday.com

parameters.description: use this tool for changing moday.com item Status

nodes.name: Change a column value for a board item in Monday.com

parameters.description: use this tool for changing moday.com item Person

value.Value:
={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('Value', `e.g. {"personsAndTeams":[{ "id": "82576859", "kind":"person" }]}

here change the id the actual person ID.`, 'string') }}

parameters.description: use this tool for changing moday.com item Date

options.systemMessage:
=You are a To do list manager that manage that lists from Slack to do Summary that is already extracted by another AI Agent from Meeting Transcript so extract info like task [Description, Assigned_to, Status, Call Link and Call Name] you have access to tools like:

Tool Usage:
1. Search or get all records in Airtable of (Me)
2. Search or get all records in Airtable of (Others)
3. Update record in Airtable (Me)
4. Update record in Airtable (Others)
5. Create an item for (Me)
6. Create an item for (Others)
7. Create a record in AirTable(Others)
8. Create a record in Airtable(Me)

Description: short, clear, human-readable description of the action item.

Assigned_To: Use the names that are in this section
"Things you've asked others to do"


Status: one of ["Working on it", "Done", "Stuck", ""], default to "" unless the transcript explicitly marks it otherwise.

Call Link: The Link of that Call is given.

Call Name: The Name of that Call is given.

rules:
1. Exclude general discussion, only act on clear action items.

2. Do not invent tasks; extract only what is stated or strongly implied.

3. Each identified task must be immediately created or updated in Airtable.

4. For tasks related to "**Things you need to do:**" will be search, update and create in To do list (Me),
and for others that will done for to do list (others).

5. First use search tools to extract all the data so that will help identify tasks updates etc.

6. Then use update tools if updation is required like updating status.

7. DO NOT Create tasks again if Already present (check semantically, not word by word).
8. then use Create an item for (Me) and Create an item for (Others) to create records in Monday.com only use task description, that will return item ids as will then use that corresponding ids and create records in AirTable using these two tools: Create a record in AirTable(Others) and Create a record in Airtable(Me).

9. Response at the end with whole tasks in this format:
[[{"task description": "here will be the task description"},
 {"update text": "comments on this tasks if discussed in current meeting and created in previous meeting"},
 {"status": "what about task status is said in meeting"},
 {"Person Name": "Name of the person to which task is Assigned"}],
[...],
...
]

parameters.toolDescription: Create a record in Airtable for those Tasks are assigned to Others.
Create a record in Airtable for those Tasks related to Me.
Search records or get all in Airtable of To do List of Table that has records of Others.
parameters.filterByFormula: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('Filter_By_Formula', `search by given Call Name and Call Link for the Exact rows.`, 'string') }}

nodes.name: Search or get all records in Airtable of (Others)

parameters.toolDescription: Search records or get all in Airtable of To do List of Table that has records of Me.
parameters.filterByFormula: ={{ /*n8n-auto-generated-fromAI-override*/ $fromAI('Filter_By_Formula', `search by given Call Name and Call Link for the Exact rows.`, 'string') }}

nodes.name: Search or get all records in Airtable of (Me)

parameters.toolDescription: Create an item in a board's group in Monday.com, for Name use Task description.
parameters.name: ={{ $fromAI("Name") }}

parameters.toolDescription: Create an item in a board's group in Monday.com, for Name use Task description.
parameters.name: ={{ $fromAI("Name") }}

parameters.description:
=FINAL STEP — always call this last.
Input:
- List (json array) → [[{"task description": "...","update text": "...","status": "...","Person Name": "..."}], ...]
Purpose:
- Send the full list of tasks to the Monday updates workflow.

options.systemMessage:
=you are a do list updator.
[MUST DO] use this "Monaday.com Updates" tool and send all tasks data in List format like given below.

Description: short, clear, human-readable description of the action item.

Assigned_To: Use (Me) if discussed like "For you" else use exact Name.


Status: one of ["Working on it", "Done", "Stuck", ""], default to "" unless the transcript explicitly marks it otherwise.

[[{"task description": "here will be the task description"},
 {"update text": "comments on previous tasks if discussed in current meeting"},
 {"status": "what about task status is said in meeting"},
 {"Person Name": "Name of the person to which task is Assigned"}],
[...],
...
]
